title: Create dynamic snake visualization that grows with user registrations

requirements.text: Create a user registration system that allows users to sign up with a username
acceptanceCriteria: Users can register with a unique username
Registration form is accessible from the main interface
Backend stores registered users persistently
Registration triggers snake growth event

requirements.text: Implement backend logic to track the snake's segments, where each new user registration adds one segment to the snake

quotes: crée un snake au fur et à mesure qu'un utilisateur s'inscrit

acceptanceCriteria: Snake starts with an initial length
Each user registration increments the snake length by one segment
Snake segment data is persisted across canister upgrades
Backend provides query method to retrieve current snake length and user count

requirements.text: Create a dynamic 2D canvas visualization where the snake continuously moves across the screen in an animated pattern

quotes: on verra le serpent se promener sur un lecteur dynamique

acceptanceCriteria: Snake renders on a 2D canvas or similar visualization surface
Snake moves continuously in a smooth, animated pattern
Movement is automatic and does not require user input
Canvas is responsive and adapts to different screen sizes

requirements.text: Implement real-time visual updates that show the snake growing longer as new users register, with smooth segment addition animations
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend polls or queries backend for snake length updates
New segments are added to the snake with smooth animation
Visual feedback clearly shows the snake's growth
Display shows current number of registered users

requirements.text: Design a cohesive visual theme with vibrant, playful colors and smooth animations that emphasize the dynamic, growing nature of the snake visualization
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design uses a consistent color palette throughout the application
Snake has a distinct, appealing visual style
Animations are smooth and enhance the user experience
Typography and layout support the playful, dynamic theme

constraints: Snake movement must be continuous and automatic
Each user registration must add exactly one segment to the snake
User registrations must be persistent across canister upgrades
nonGoals: User-controlled snake gameplay or direction control
Multiplayer snake racing or competition features
Snake eating food items for growth
